about_text_part1: I am KAYA RHABBY Pascia Hershe, an engineering student specializing in Systems and Information Technology at Polytech Nancy. Originally from the Congo, I earned a scientific baccalaureate before pursuing my studies in computer science at the University of Strasbourg, where I obtained a DEUG (Diploma of General University Studies).
about_text_part2: With a deep passion for information technology, I have developed strong skills in Python, Java, C/C++, and JavaScript. Alongside my formal education, I continuously enhance my knowledge through self-learning platforms such as Udemy, earning certifications in web development, cloud computing, and networking.
about_text_part3: Beyond academics, I have a keen interest in basketball and Latin dance, which have helped me foster important qualities like teamwork and discipline.
about_text_part4: My professional ambition is to specialize in software development and cloud engineering, with a strong focus on DevOps practices.
